metadata.title: CVE-2023-42852 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks. This issue is fixed iniOS 17.1 and iPadOS 17.1, watchOS 10.1, iOS 16.7.2 and iPadOS 16.7.2, macOSSonoma 14.1, Safari 17.1, tvOS 17.1. Processing web content may lead toarbitrary code execution.

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
wpewebkit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
